issue.title: Allow setting the pickler to use in pyarrow serialization.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2011](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2011). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We currently try to import cloudpickle and failing that fall back to pickle. However, given that there are many versions of cloudpickle and they are typically incompatible with one another, the caller may want to specify a specific version, so we should allow them to set the specific pickler to use.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2011?focusedCommentId=16332973) by Philipp Moritz (pcmoritz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1493
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1493>
